# CUE Provider

Terraform provider for generating JSON documents with [CUE](https://cuelang.org/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "cue" {}

data "cue_export" "example" {}

output "example" {
  value = jsondecode(data.cue_export.example.rendered)
}
```
